item.title: Arabic Speaking Influencers in Turkey
item.dc:creator: Can Kocaoglu
item.description: The post Arabic Speaking Influencers in Turkey appeared first on Yollando.
item.content:encoded:
During the past few years, Turkey has opened up to the Arab world, with thousands of Arabs flocking to it annually for study, traveling, investing, medical treatment, among many other reasons.

With the growth of Arab societies in Turkey, many young people wanted to share their experiences during their stay in this country, and social media was the best way to achieve this. Some have succeeded in growing a huge social media presence with millions of followers.

Yollando has prepared the following report, which sheds light on a group of the most prominent of these Arab speaking influencers in Turkey.

 

Mohamad Kendo

The Syrian artist “Muhammad Kendo” graduated from the Faculty of Journalism and Information, and later devoted himself to religious songs in both Arabic and Turkish.

“Mohamad Kendo” identifies himself as an artist with a purposeful religious and social message, and says that he hopes his voice will bring happiness to everyone who hears him.

Mohamad Kendo’s followers on social media numbered hundreds of thousands and in some cases millions, especially on Facebook, YouTube, and Instagram.

Mohamad Kendo has many famous songs, but the song “Muhammad is our Prophet“, which he recorded with his young daughter, “Judy”, is the most-watched on his YouTube channel, although its duration doesn’t exceed one minute.

Mehdi KAMKH

A Syrian young man, who specializes in presenting social videos that mix Turkish and Arabic languages, and focus on surveying the opinions of passers-by on the streets.

“Mehdi Kamkh” also presents Turkish language teaching videos that are characterized by their short duration and their focus on the sentences and phrases most used in daily life, especially on YouTube and Instagram.

“Kamkh” posted many videos that achieved millions of views, the most prominent of which was a video in which he reviewed the reactions of Turkish citizens when he pretended that he did not know any Turkish and asked them to read a text message written in Turkish saying that his father had passed away.

Amal Al Turk

A Saudi-Turkish entrepreneur specializes in providing videos for women, including food recipes, hair and skin advice, and more.

Al-Turk also presents videos about its tours and diaries in Turkey, and has more than a million views on the Instagram platform.

Dua Mnalla Alrayess

A blogger and esthetician living in Turkey, she provides advice to women on a wide variety of topics, including makeup, hair, and skincare.

Doaa presents, through her videos, a number of natural face masks, in addition to a review of a variety of veil rolls.

 

Find Out With Rhf

It provides diaries in the Turkish city of Istanbul, including cell trips, traditional meals, etc., on the Instagram platform.

It is characterized by providing short and quick videos without audio comment, highlighting some of Istanbul’s landmarks.

 

Hussam Abd

A Syrian designer and web developer, interested in entrepreneurship and developing emerging projects, he provides various videos on topics related to technology and business development.

 

Ghada Othman

A Jordanian fashion designer and entrepreneur, she has hundreds of thousands of followers on social media.

Ghada launched a special project for veiled clothes, which she says is characterized by high-quality materials and models that are modern, and at the same time compatible with the Arab culture.

 

Mohamad Sarhan

A Palestinian prepares videos about Turkey’s restaurants; he goes to them and reviews the most prominent traditional and modern foods, then explains their ingredients and tries to describe their taste.

He gets thousands of views, whether on his YouTube channel, or his Instagram and Facebook pages.

He has many distinctive videos, including “The Best Meat Restaurant in Istanbul” which received more than 700,000 views on the YouTube channel only.

 

Muthana AlSalih

An Iraqi journalist and reporter residing in Istanbul, focusing on providing short and light social and news videos.

“Muthana” has tens of thousands of followers and views on its social media pages, especially Instagram and YouTube.

“Muthana” has many distinctive videos, especially the video entitled “Sadeem Challenge Two: The Challenge of Specialization: A Young Man Looking for a Job Opportunity?“, Which received more than 50 thousand views.

 

Samar Shaker

An Iraqi blogger residing in Turkey, born in 1990, with a BA in Communications Engineering, she began her social media career by sharing her daily experiences as a veiled woman.

After that, Samar set out to present videos about veiled clothes and many topics of interest to women in general, and she had previously presented a TV program on these topics.

Samar also focuses on the topic of trips, so she tours places with her husband, and share the details of her trips through the camera lenses.

The videos provided by “Samar” have millions of views on social media, especially on Instagram and YouTube.

 

Abdulrahman Algamily

A Yemeni blogger living in Turkey, he presents and discusses many social topics through his social media pages.

“Algamily” focuses on reviewing aspects of life in Turkey in general and in Istanbul in particular. He has many videos that have achieved high views

The most prominent of these videos was titled “Young Arabian visits Dirilis Ertugrul and watch an amazing military Show”, which received more than 3.5 million views.

 

Eman Ridha

An Iraqi illustrator and blogger, on her social media pages, she talks about her daily life and her way of life in Turkey.

Eman Reda is keen to present her videos in a simple way, in the natural places where she lives, using the Iraqi dialect.

 

AYMAN NABEEL

A Syrian young man has resided in Turkey for years and provides advice on living and buying property in Turkey.

“Ayman Nabil” calls his social media brand “Turkey’s story” on his Instagram and Facebook pages.

 

UpSaad

A young Iraqi man, born in 1990, has a mechanical engineering degree from Tikrit University and resides in Turkey.

  Saad’s passion for design, photography, and montage overtook his studies, and his main job now is as a videographer.

“Saad” provides, through his social media pages Instagram, YouTube, Twitter, and Facebook, technological information and advice, in addition to various topics, in a simple way, and in the Iraqi dialect.

 

Salah Chatah

A Syrian author and blogger residing in Turkey, working in the field of teaching Turkish, provides training courses, and has a published book entitled “Learn Turkish from your mother tongue”

“Chatah” also presents, through its social media pages, especially Instagram and YouTube, various tourist, cultural and social videos.

“Chatah” has many followers of his videos and publications, but the most prominent video of him, was entitled “A meeting with the grandson of Sultan Abdul Hamid II“, and it received more than a million views on YouTube.

Mohamed and Rami Moussalli

Two young Syrians reside in Istanbul, Turkey, and present a variety of videos on YouTube that are mostly comic.

“Mohamed” and “Rami” have independent pages on other social media sites, in which each one of them expresses his own interests.

Register to Yollando

The post Arabic Speaking Influencers in Turkey appeared first on Yollando.

item.title: What Arabs from the GCC really like to buy from Turkey?
item.dc:creator: Can Kocaoglu
item.description: The post What Arabs from the GCC really like to buy from Turkey? appeared first on Yollando.
item.content:encoded:
What Arabs from the GCC countries really like to buy from Turkey has become a trending topic. Turkey is becoming increasingly more attractive for the GCC (Gulf Cooperation Council) countries for its high quality products delivered at affordable prices.

The Turkish government encourages local companies to produce and export with incentives in taxes and financing. Now you can buy most of the Turkish products through e-commerce websites and have Yollando recieve your order in Turkey, repackage it and ship it to your country.

In this article we look at what Arabs from the GCC really like to buy from Turkey.

Clothes

Many people from the GCC like to buy Turkish clothes for its high quality, modern look, and competitive price. In 2019, Turkey ranked 6th in the share of world leading clothing exporters.

We take a look at some of the popular brands:

  1. Modanisa: A popular hijabi and Muslim clothing website, winner of many awards. Modanisa offers the GCC women a modern look that is also compatible with one’s traditions and beliefs.
  2. Pierre Cardin: This international luxury brand is licensed to be manufactured in Turkey, which means you can buy high-end quality clothes and for a very competitive price.

Other Turkish clothing brands like Mavi, LC Waikiki, and DeFacto are cheaper to buy from Turkish websites and they have larger collections than their international franchises. 

 

Footwear

Turkey is famous for its high quality and stylish shoes. And shoes which are manufactured in Turkey always enjoy a competitive advantage against other companies. 

One of the most famous Turkish shoes brands are:

1-Greyder: which rose to international fame for its high quality boots and shoes to compete with international brands.

2-Flo: is considered one of the most affordable and most popular in Turkey in terms of production volume. Flo sells their shoes under other brand names like Kinetix and Polaris.

3-Tergan: which offers shoes, sneakers, sandals and leather shoes at great quality and promotional prices. 

4-Ziya: is a Turkish shoes retailer which has fashionable shoes especially for winter.

5-Kemal Tanca: one of the leading Turkish shoes brands in the country and the region.

Carpets

Turkish carpets are one of the many products people from the GCC like to buy. Turkey has a reputation for having professional and experienced companies in carpets and rugs manufacturing.

Top brands in carpet manufacturing:

 

 

1-Merinos: The company was started in 1970 and is considered one of the top manufacturers of carpets in Turkey. 

 

2-Padişah Halı: are one of the known names in the carpet market, and it has beautiful and elegant Turkish style carpets.

 

 

3-Artemis Halı: which offers seasonal and fashionable collections of carpets for your modern home.

 

Cutlery and Tableware

The trade of making cutlery and silverware is very traditional in Turkey, but has developed with time and modern equipment and machinery. Today people in the GCC and other countries like to buy Turkish cutlery or tea cups and coffee cups to add a cultural touch to their kitchen.

 

Home Accessories and Decoration

Turkish home accessories and decorations are elegant and in high demand due to their affordability and high quality. 

Most of the mentioned products can be bought online through Turkish ecommerce websites like Trendyol, HepsiBurada, N11 and more. With Yollando, we give you a free and unique shipping address to have your products delivered to us. We then repackage them and ship them to your country.

Register to Yollando

The post What Arabs from the GCC really like to buy from Turkey? appeared first on Yollando.

item.title: Tech and Unboxing Arabic Speaking Influencers for You to Follow on Youtube
item.dc:creator: Can Kocaoglu
item.description: The post Tech and Unboxing Arabic Speaking Influencers for You to Follow on Youtube appeared first on Yollando.
item.content:encoded:
Tech and unboxing Arabic speaking youtubers have grown considerably now and are setting trends and influencing Arabic audiences around the world.

We have listed for you the top tech and unboxing Arabic speaking influencers and which of their content has gone viral.

NewTech

  • NewTech presented by the Saudi technical blogger “Abdullah Al-Ghafes“. It is concerned with developments in the world of technology, through comparisons, reviews, explanations, and electronic shopping advice.
  • Al-Ghafes specializes in providing videos to measure the resistance of mobile phones. Among these tests are: (traction on the sand in a car – scratching with sharp and hard metal tools – dropping on ceramics – dumping and leaving in water – dropping heavy stones on it – lighting fireworks in it. … etc).
  • The channel’s videos have achieved great popularity inside and outside Saudi Arabia, one of the most prominent of these videos is “Drop Test: iPhone X VS Galaxy Note 8“, which exceeded 4.5 million views.
  • Al-Ghafes also runs a blog of the same name as the channel, which publishes everything new in the world of technology and communications.

 

iMAD Tech

  • iMAD Tech youtube channel, presented by the Iraqi engineer “Hussein Al-Jazaery”, and aims to provide developments in the world of technology, including reviews of the latest technical and electronic devices.
  • The channel, which was inaugurated in 2016, focuses primarily on various types of mobile phones.
  • The channel has many famous videos, but the most followed video ever was titled “How much do I earn from YouTube“, with 4.5 million views, followed by another video entitled “Delete Instagram Account Permanently“, with 3 million views.

 

Amin Al Mayouf  

  • A young blogger tried through his channel to focus on everything related to technology, including explaining mobile phone applications and their types, the most important sites that provide online services in graphic design and video editing programs, and other technical topics.
  • Although most of his videos are widely viewed, but the video titled “How to create and create a montage from your mobile phone” received the most views, with more than a million views.

 

Mahmoud Saad

  • A young Egyptian man who dedicated his channel to highlight the best means of making money through the Internet, especially with regard to digital currencies and online purchases.
  • “Mahmoud Saad”, who presents the videos with his voice only without appearing on the channel, has many videos that have achieved good views, such as Bitcoin, and how to profit from polling sites.
  • “Mahmoud Saad” supervises with the participation of a group of young people on an electronic forum called “The Captain“, to publish articles on how to make profits from digital currencies and other sources of electronic income.

 

Almohtarif Channel

  • Almohtarif (Professional) Channel was founded by writer Amin Raghib, who was the first Moroccan to receive the silver “YouTube” shield, and who won the award for the best blogger in Morocco.
  • Amin Raghib was born in 1986 in Marrakesh, and in 2015 he won the Social Media Pioneer Award from the ruler of Dubai, Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum.
  • In addition to his YouTube channel, “Raghib” supervises the “Almohtarif” blog, which is a huge platform that includes a large number of written and video reports on various technical topics.
  • Almohtarif channel has many videos with great views, including the video entitled “How to Hack a Facebook Account”, which has achieved more than 3.5 million views.

 

TMFaisal

  •  “TM Faisal” channel is presented by a young Saudi man who identifies himself only as “Faisal” and focuses on explaining the latest and most famous electronic games, in addition to reviewing a number of modern gaming devices.
  • Faisal’s style is characterized by simplicity and a light enthusiastic nature, which made him succeed in achieving millions of views.
  • His most notable video is called “Shawarma Challenge – The Loser Eats Hot Shawarma“, which has achieved more than 7 million views.

 

Razan Dokhi

  • A channel started by a Saudi woman called “Razan Dokhi”. She focuses on training and educating those interested in the field of embroidery, in light of reviewing its basics, skills, and the latest equipment and supplies related to it.
  • “Razan” holds a BA in Psychology and presents her videos in a simplified manner, without appearing in person, neither in sound nor image, and depends only on what is displayed on the screen, and sometimes adding text to increase the clarification.
  • Razan has many distinguished videos, the most prominent of which is the video titled “Embroidery for Beginners: How to Organize, Fix and Hold the Thread + The Best Way to Remove the Traces of the Embroidery Basics!“.

 

Nology

  • A comprehensive digital media channel, founded by “Omar Mohsen“, a young Egyptian who lives in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The channel was originally called “EgKNOW” in 2014 before it was changed to NologyTV.
  • The channel seeks to achieve many goals, including providing a distinct educational product, in an interesting and brief way, on various applications and digital and electronic devices.
  • The channel was named “Nology”, by combining the two words “technology” and “knowledge”.
  • Their notable video “Your guide to learning Excel from scratch and even professionalism in one video!” has achieved more than 6.5 million views.

BUSINESS CORNER

  • It is a channel founded by Syrian blogger and entrepreneur “Atef Torkmani”, through which he aims to provide reliable advice to those looking for business and investment opportunities.
  • “Turkomani” has a huge blog with lots of videos, reports, and articles on the business community, e-commerce, marketing, and advertising.
  • The channel has a number of distinctive videos, such as: “Tips before establishing a restaurant“, “Trading frozen dollars“, “Importing Turkish clothes“, and many others.

Faisal Saleh

  • A channel founded by the Saudi blogger “Faisal Saleh”, in which he talks about a variety of topics, which are mostly educational, especially in the field of trade and technology.
  • “Saleh” made many recordings that were widely viewed, but the most prominent was the video entitled “He tried to steal my money, but in the end I exposed him, and he admitted that he was a fraud“, with more than 3 million views.

Chahrota 91

  • Chahrouta 91 is a channel started by “Sheherazade”, an Algerian dentist who lives in Turkey.
  • The channel includes Scheherazade’s diary with her family, consisting of her husband and infant daughter.
  • Scheherazade has published many videos in which she speaks in the Algerian dialect and the French language, among them, “Turkish breakfast prepared by me and my husband” and “Beyaz Peynir, a Turkish cheese recipe that you requested from me on Instagram.”
Sign Up Now

The post Tech and Unboxing Arabic Speaking Influencers for You to Follow on Youtube appeared first on Yollando.

item.title: How to Use Buy For Me Service
item.dc:creator: Test YAS&nbspT
item.description: The post How to Use Buy For Me Service appeared first on Yollando.
item.content:encoded:
Online shopping sites in Turkey are open to the whole world now thanks to Yollando. With Yollando you can buy the product yourself, or we can buy it for you.

 With Buy For Me service, you can complete your shopping easier, safer and faster. If you do not want to be concerned about whether your international credit cards are valid in Turkey or not or getting lost in the purchasing process of a foreign language shopping site, Buy For Me service offers a perfect way of easy shopping. We will do the shopping for you with a 10 percent service fee and send it directly to your Yollando inbox.

Let us briefly describe how Buy For Me works:

1- First logging into your Yollando account.

2- Click Buy For Me from the menu on the right.

3- Paste the link of the product you want from the shopping site in the required area.

4- After writing the desired color and size in the description section, choose the quantity of the product. 

5- For the payment, you have two options: from Balance or by credit card. If you choose from balance, after the review is done the Buy For Me operator will directly deduct the fee from your balance and buy the item for you fastly and if you choose the credit card option, after your items are reviewed by the Buy For Me operator you will get a notification about the price and once you finalize the payment, the operator will purchase the items you requested. 

In this way, you will create your purchase request. 

All buy for me requests go through a review stage where the operator checks if the item is available, can be shipped, and if the stock is enough. Usually, you get your confirmation email around 20 minutes during working hours, so you can pay for the order either by credit card or balance account in Yollando system. 

When your product arrives at the Yollando address, it will be checked for the correct color-size. If there is any problem with the product, Yollando will take care of the return operations for you. Finally, you can choose the appropriate delivery option to your home country address and make your payment through your Yollando account. It’s that simple with Buy For Me service, so create your Yollando account and start shopping! We’ll take care of the rest…

Buy For Me

The post How to Use Buy For Me Service appeared first on Yollando.

item.title: The Guide For Turkish Shopping Sites
item.dc:creator: Can Kocaoglu
item.description: The post The Guide For Turkish Shopping Sites appeared first on Yollando.
item.content:encoded:
It is quite simple to buy clothes from online shopping sites in Turkey and send them abroad thanks to Yollando. You can purchase clothes suitable for your style from Trendyol, Morhipo, Hepsiburada, N11, U.S Polo Assn., Koton, Beymen, and many other online shopping sites.

The steps that you need to do to buy the outfit you want from any Turkish shopping website works more or less similarly on each site as follows:

  1. You can complete your registration with the password you will create by entering an e-mail address you use from the Giriş Yap (Login)> Üye Ol (Sign Up) field. It is possible to sign up via Facebook or Google accounts. You can order without being registered. To do this, simply add the products you want to buy from the product pages to the basket and click Üye Olmadan Devam Et (‘Continue without being a member’) on the screen that appears at the Sepeti Onayla (‘Confirm the basket’) button. You can follow the notifications of the order you have placed without being a member of the e-mail address you shared during the order.

  1. After registered, you can choose the categories such as kadın(women), erkek(men), çocuk(child), ayakkabı/çanta (shoes/purse) or you can search the item. Select the size and color of the product you like and click Sepete Ekle (add to basket). If you wish, you can continue or go to your basket and complete the shopping.

  1. A shipping fee may be added depending on the product, price, campaign, etc. you purchase. Generally, no shipping fee is required for relatively high priced purchases.

  1. When you click Devam Et (Continue), type your Yollando address in the address section that appears.

    • Yollando Address: Ahmediye Mahallesi Halk Cad. no.: 37 Asma Kat 34672 Üsküdar – İstanbul

  1. Write your card information in the payment section and evaluate the installment options.

  1. After checking the “Ön bilgilendirme koşulları okudum” (“I have read the terms and conditions”), click on the satın al/ödeme yap (purchase) button and your transaction is complete. From this point on, Yollando will take care of your product and send it to your address.

Yollando also offers another and easier way: take advantage of Buy For Me service.

Go to Yollando

The post The Guide For Turkish Shopping Sites appeared first on Yollando.

item.title: How to Shop from Turkey and Ship to Jordan Using Yollando
item.dc:creator: Can Kocaoglu
item.description: The post How to Shop from Turkey and Ship to Jordan Using Yollando appeared first on Yollando.
item.content:encoded:
Many citizens and residents of Jordan want to buy products and goods from Turkey, but they either can’t find the products in the Jordanian market or they’re available but are overly-priced.

With “Yollando” the solution is always available …

           and you will definitely find it.

Yollando is happy to provide the opportunity for citizens and residents of the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan to buy all Turkish products, at the same prices they are sold at in Turkey.

How can I use “Yollando“

–         Register on the website of “Yollando“, and get your own unique address in Turkey.

–         Buy the product you want, or let the company buy it for you.

–       Wait for your product to arrive at your address in Turkey and the Yollando team will add it to your account.

–       After you have the packages you’re expecting you can have them shipped to your address in Jordan by selecting them all.

Ways to buy from Turkey ?

The first method:

–         Buying directly from the websites, even if you don’t know the Turkish language, and will reach your Yollando-provided address in Turkey. Then Yollando will ship it to your home address in Jordan.

The second method:

–         Send “Yollando” a link to the product or the address of the shop that sells it, and Yollando will buy it for you. Then ship it to your home address in Jordan.

Advantages of buying using “Yollando“

–        The possibility of purchasing without limits.

–        We have agreements with shipping companies, which save you more than 20% of expenses.

–       We deal with major international shipping companies: (Sky Net Express – DHL Express – UPS Express ).

–         We can save you a lot of shipping expenses in case you buy more than one product, by combining these products in one shipment, packaging them, and sending them to your home.

–         We ship to many Jordanian cities and neighborhoods. Yollando has previously shipped to: (Amman, Zarqa, Irbid, Russeifa, Al-Quwaysimah, Wadi as-Ser, Al-Jubayhah, Sahab, Ar Ramtha, Suwaylih, Aqaba, Mafraq, Madaba, Al-Jizah, Aydoun, Tafilah, Anjara, Ma’an, Kerak, Huwwarah, and others).

Types of products that can be bought using “Yollando“

–          (Clothes – furnishings – accessories – electrical appliances – antiques – gifts – luxury goods – furniture – jewelry … etc.), and anything you want, you just have to choose, and Yollando ships it to your home.

–         There are many Turkish shopping sites, through which it is possible to buy all products of various kinds.

Is it possible to buy from Turkey without speaking Turkish?

–         Many Turkish sites allow purchases in more than one language, especially Arabic and English.

–         In case of buying from a site that is not translated, “Yollando” offers the best way to buy from these sites step by step with pictures.

 

Register with “Yollando” and start shopping from Turkey. Your product will be delivered to you at the best price and in the fastest time.

 

Register to Yollando

The post How to Shop from Turkey and Ship to Jordan Using Yollando appeared first on Yollando.

item.title: Biggest Social Media Influencers in Jordan
item.dc:creator: zakaria.zerrari@yollando.com
item.category: How to shop from Turkey ship to Jordan
item.description: The post Biggest Social Media Influencers in Jordan appeared first on Yollando.
item.content:encoded:
The biggest social media influencers in Jordan range from bloggers and youtubers to entrepreneurs all the way to the queen. Continue reading to know more about what the most influential personalities in Jordan are doing online.

 

Queen Rania Al-Abdullah

 

Queen Rania Al-Abdullah is the wife of His Majesty King Abdullah II ibn Al Hussein of the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan.

Since marrying the King of Jordan, she has become known for her advocacy work related to education, health, community empowerment, youth, cross-cultural dialogue, and micro-finance.

Queen Rania’s online profiles boast a tremendous following of younger and older people who look up to her as a role model and leader.

 

 

 

Ola Tahseen Al Fares

 

Ola Al-Fares is a Jordanian lawyer, journalist and television presenter who works at Al Jazeera. She is currently the second most followed Jordanian woman on Twitter after Queen Rania.

She won the distinguished social media award “Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Award for humanitarian causes”. She has used her social media to support many humanitarian initiatives to help the less fortunate people in life.

 

 

 

 

Tima Shomali

 

Tima Shomali is a Jordanian producer, director, writer, and comedy actress.

She founded her own production company and through the company, she created and starred in her first Web series. The show attracted millions of viewers from across the region online, which led to it being aired on different TV stations around the region.

 

 

 

 

Hadeel Shihadeh

 

Hadeel is an expert in digital marketing, and one of the 10 most powerful social media influencers in Jordan.

She believes that social networking sites provided an opportunity to communicate with new cultures, especially in Arab countries.

 

 

 

 

Ghada Othman

 

 

Ghada Othman is a Jordanian fashion designer and entrepreneur, she has hundreds of thousands of followers on social media.

She opened Ghada Shop, a luxury clothing store for veiled clothes, which she says is characterized by high-quality materials and models that are modern, and at the same time compatible with the Arab culture.

 

 

 

Talah Al-Alami

 

A Jordanian entrepreneur and beauty expert, she gained great fame after the spread of her makeup work on social media, and she gained hundreds of thousands of followers.

Talah offers many ways and means of applying makeup, as well as advice on caring for the skin, and how to wear clothes that match colors and shapes.

 

 

 

 

Raghda Talin Kouyoumdjian

Raghda is a Jordanian content creator and vlogger.

She is famous for her video reactions on YouTube, which are of a comical nature, and which rely on quick-wittedness and facial expressions.

Raghda achieved great fame after participating in the third season of the “Sadeem” program, and have millions of followers on social media platforms.

 

 

 

 

Yazan Nobani

 

 

Yazan Nobani is a Jordanian online content creator who is famous for his eponymous YouTube channel.

He has gained popularity for his original short films and sketch comedy, utilizing his different characters.

 

 

 

Ayman Aballi

 

Ayman is a Jordanian blogger and comedian who has thousands of followers from all over the Arab world.

Aballi affirms that he is working to employ humanitarian work in the videos he presents, by being keen to help others and provide solutions to their problems as much as possible.

 

 

 

 

Iman Ammari

 

 

Iman Ammari is a Jordanian chef and entrepreneur. She received two bachelor’s degrees, the first in business administration from Al-Ahliyya Amman University, and the second in English literature at Petra University of Jordan.

Chef “Iman Ammari” has taken cooking and pastry courses in Britain, France, Italy, and Austria.

She has participated in various TV shows and has a huge following on social media.

 

 

 

Mohammad Aljoulani

 

A Jordanian blogger and artist, with a degree in business administration, and has professional experience in the field of men’s clothing, whether as an administrator in a company or as a model.

He has a large number of followers on social media, and he is among the 100 most influential people on these sites in Jordan.

 

 

 

 

Haya Karazon

 

Karazon is a Jordanian blogger, with hundreds of thousands of followers on social media, especially Snapchat and Instagram.

“Haya” has many interests, including reviewing the latest international clothing trends, in addition to a number of social activities.

 

 

 

 

Dana Abu Khader

 

In addition to her bright career as a TV presenter, “Dana” has successfully written her first book and published it in 2016, the book speaks about her Journey in the Media world.

“Dana” has a bachelor’s degree in English-Spanish languages from the University of Jordan and a certificate in photography and TV production from the New York Academy in the United States.

She has many interests which include women empowerment, books, family, and music

Go to Yollando

The post Biggest Social Media Influencers in Jordan appeared first on Yollando.

item.title: Online Stores From Turkey
item.dc:creator: Can Kocaoglu
item.description: The post Online Stores From Turkey appeared first on Yollando.
item.content:encoded:
In the digitalizing 21st century, e-commerce sites are starting to pick up day by day. The most important thing for consumers is how active e-commerce sites are and how they successfully present their visual content to us. Yollando offers the possibility to make the best shopping sites to which you in Turkey. We provide reliable and quality shopping from successful and proven companies such as ZARA, IPEKYOL, MASSIMO DUTTI, KOTON, TRENDYOL, HEPSİBURADA, N11, BOYNER, LC WAIKIKI.

ZARA

The choice of the majority of consumers, in general, is ZARA. WHY do you think? A very simple question is they actually have new creations in line with quality, brand awareness and trends. When you want to find a new trendy sweater or shoe, the first thing that comes to mind is ZARA.

TRENDYOL

Then, you can come across TRENDYOL, where you can find everything you want both in terms of price performance and easily.

MASSIMO DUTTI

On the other hand, consumers who like to wear more formal clothing in their daily life prefer MASSIMO DUTTI‘s jackets and pencil dresses.

IPEKYOL

At the same time, IPEKYOL, who wants to show how formal clothes should be used in daily life. It’s expanded its foreign customer portfolio and increased its recognition abroad thanks to the cooperation they have realized with Leonie Hanne.

KOTON

If KOTON; By collaborating with Arzu Sabanci collection, which has accomplished successful works both in the business world and in the fashion sector, it offered its customers a colorful and memorable collection.

LC WAIKIKI

On the other hand, LC WAIKIKI  promised its consumers to have high quality and affordable products with the slogan “It is everyone’s right to dress well”. LC WAIKIKI, which has stores in 47 countries, sets itself a good example for us both in terms of product quality and in terms of prices being suitable for every budget.

Sign Up Now

The post Online Stores From Turkey appeared first on Yollando.

item.title: Package Shipping Problem!! Solution is Yollando
item.dc:creator: Can Kocaoglu
item.description: The post Package Shipping Problem!! Solution is Yollando appeared first on Yollando.
item.content:encoded:
Various online shopping sites in Turkey offer plenty of different products from clothing to tech to their customers. While it generally works hassle-free in domestic distribution, shipping abroad has always been a tiresome issue for years. This e-exporting arm with slow steps in advancing Turkey is trying to become easier to handle through diverse connections but cannot work very well. Turkey’s e-commerce which cannot follow climbing online shopping behaviors so limited by spatial borders and turns insufficient for abroad relations does not have any qualified e-exporting branch. However, Turkey has a high potential market for different products to a variety of geographical advantages. The biggest part where this potential is lost in individual and relatively small-scale purchases and hesitates is shipping. For example, in the ready-made clothing sector, delivery problems that appear like a huge wall in front of customers abroad await a solution.

Yollando as a Brand New Solution

If you seek a system that the products you buy online from different sites can be directed in Turkey, then re-organize them in a single package or even check that you will be able to send them back before leaving the country. Yollando presents the easiest way for shopping directly from Turkey. In this sense, the work to mend the problems with overseas delivery, Yollando plays an important role in Turkey. It can be said that for those who live hundreds of kilometers away, the Turkish market is located much closer to Yollando.

This exhausting process becomes comfortable while receiving the product you ordered smoothly. From Germany to Kuwait, Israel to Russia the package bought in Turkey from different countries of the world is aimed to reach easily in the hands of the customer without getting lost in the process between the two countries. Also, the use of Yollando is quite simple. After getting the Yollando address from the customer panel with signing up to the website, write this address as the delivery address down to your shopping and the order will be sent to you via Yollando. You can order any product you want at any time without any shopping limits and track your cargo with Yollando support.

Package Delivery Anywhere in the World From Turkey

While dozens of different online shopping sites deliver products to buyers in the country with their various conveniences, they cannot utilize the cargo companies for abroad orders. Although the companies open their delivery processes abroad, which they have set up with their initiatives, this painful process for them relieves customers but requires an additional cost and a business model accordingly. As such, question marks similar to the hesitation seen in the customer’s force brands to take a step back. Throughout the overlapping problems regarding the producer-mediator-consumer chain can not enter into a global interaction without any outside intervention. In particular, the delivery of goods from Turkey to abroad starts to become taken for granted to a lameness. Seeing the problems in this cycle, Yollando aims to give the sector a sigh of relief with its service.

Register to Yollando

The post Package Shipping Problem!! Solution is Yollando appeared first on Yollando.
